price: kao da na njoj nikad nisu ni postojali. Daleko bio Medjen, kao i Semud!
arabic: كَأَن لَّمۡ يَغۡنَوۡاْ فِيهَآۗ أَلَا بُعۡدٗا لِّمَدۡيَنَ كَمَا بَعِدَتۡ ثَمُودُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ka-an lam yaghnaw fīhā alā buʿ'dan limadyana kamā baʿidat thamūdu
